data.value: The ride #{0} will be paid at the end of the trip using your credit card on file ending with {1}. If you're in the wrong car, choose the Pay in Car option below to ensure you are not charged for the ride.

data.value: The ride #{0} will be paid automatically at the end of the trip using your linked PayPal account and using your default tip of {1}%

data.name: Email_Body_CreditCardDeactivatedLine
data.value: Your {{ CreditCardCompany }} credit card ending by {{ Last4Digits }} has been deactivated because the payment of your last ride was declined. To be able to use it again, open {{ ApplicationName }} on your smart phone and go to the Payment screen to settle any overdue payment.
